items.summary: Replace the existing canvas-based snowfall effect with a hail effect: render falling hailstones (ice pellets) instead of snowflakes, with a visually distinct hail look (e.g., small bright pellets and/or short streaks), faster downward motion than snow, and subtle horizontal wind drift.

Preserve existing performance and accessibility behavior in the background animation: keep density caps, device-pixel-ratio scaling, resize handling, and prefers-reduced-motion support (reduced motion must not continuously animate).

Update the app to use the hail background component in the main layout so the hail effect renders behind the existing header/hero/gallery/footer content without affecting interactions (pointer-events must remain disabled for the canvas).
